abnormal_concentrations.comment: Patients with chronic renal failure on maintenance hemodialysis. These subjects were treated with nocturnal hemodialysis for 8 h during the night, 6 times/week.

references.reference_text: Raj DS, Ouwendyk M, Francoeur R, Pierratos A: Plasma amino acid profile on nocturnal hemodialysis. Blood Purif. 2000;18(2):97-102.

abnormal_concentrations.comment: Patients with chronic renal failure on maintenance hemodialysis. These subjects were treated with conventional hemodialysis for 4 h, 3 times/week.

references.reference_text: Raj DS, Ouwendyk M, Francoeur R, Pierratos A: Plasma amino acid profile on nocturnal hemodialysis. Blood Purif. 2000;18(2):97-102.
